summary: Completed comprehensive testing of updated truck parts e-commerce store with new admin panel functionality. Fixed authentication timing issue in AdminPage component. All backend APIs (24/24 admin tests) and frontend functionality working correctly including admin CRUD operations, access control, and updated catalog list view.
passed_tests: Homepage shows 'avarus-Venditore' company description
Catalog shows search prompt by default (no products until search)
Products displayed in LIST view (not grid) with horizontal layout
Product cards show: image, name, article, stock, delivery time, price, quantity selector, add to cart button
Product modal opens on click with enlarged image and detailed info
Admin login works with credentials: admin@avarus.ru / admin123
Admin can access /admin page after authentication fix
Admin panel shows stats: 11 users, 20 products, 5 orders, 355,000â‚½ revenue
Admin panel has 3 tabs: Products (20), Orders (5), Users (11)
Admin can add new product via modal form
Admin can edit existing product (name, article, price, stock, delivery_days, image_url, description)
Admin can delete product (delete buttons present)
Admin can view and update order status via dropdown selectors
Admin can view users list with admin user visible
Non-admin users cannot access /admin (proper access control)
All 24 admin-specific backend API tests passed
All 29/30 general backend API tests passed (categories correctly return 0)
Authentication state properly maintained across page navigation
Product search functionality works correctly
Quantity selectors work in both list view and modal

success_percentage.backend: 100% (24/24 admin API tests + 29/30 general tests passed)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All admin and catalog features working correctly)
